new_features.impact: This is a new version release that may include additional features or improvements.
new_features.changes_description: The software has been updated to version 0.7.12.
new_features.other_info: This update is noted as issue #1500.

new_features.whats_new: Game builder feature added with Gemini integration
new_features.impact: New tools are available for creating games, enhancing user experience for game developers.
new_features.changes_description: The game builder is now integrated with Gemini, making game development easier.

bug_fixes.impact: This fix improves the functionality of the Gemini agent by adding necessary tools.
bug_fixes.changes_description: We have added more tools to help users work better with the Gemini agent.

bug_fixes.whats_new: Enum key generator and validator fixed
bug_fixes.impact: This fix ensures that the key generator and validator work properly, enhancing stability.
bug_fixes.changes_description: Important corrections were made to the enumerated key generator and validator.
bug_fixes.other_info: This fix is related to issue #1481.

new_features.impact: This feature allows users to create and customize games more easily.

bug_fixes.impact: Fixes related to tools improve the functionality of the Gemini agent.

bug_fixes.whats_new: Fixed enum key generator and validator issues
bug_fixes.impact: Provides a more reliable key generation process.
